critique: The document is a formal executive order regarding appointments in the Post Office Department. It primarily focuses on the legal and procedural aspects of converting indefinite appointments to permanent ones. Therefore, the emotional intensity conveyed is expected to be low across all emotions. Surprise is also unlikely given the formal and procedural nature of the document.
